articles.description: Chelsea and Mauricio Pochettino are unable to shake off the unwanted label of nearly men after suffering their latest agonising Wembley defeat in the FA Cup semi-final against Manchester City.
articles.title: 'Chelsea pain self-inflicted as Man City show mentality of champions'

articles.description: Arsenal put their Champions League disappointment behind them to beat Wolves and move back to the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Arsenal win at Wolves to return to top spot

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says it is "unacceptable" his side had to play an FA Cup semi-final so soon after a Champions League quarter-final.
articles.title: 'It's not acceptable' - Guardiola hits out at schedule

articles.description: Last year's Crucible winner Luca Brecel says he is "looking forward to not being world champion again" after he loses 10-9 to David Gilbert in the first round.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2024: Luca Brecel 'didn't like attention' of being champion

articles.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton says he intends to "have some fun" in Sunday's Chinese Grand Prix after qualifying down in 18th place.
articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix 2024: Lewis Hamilton will 'have some fun' from 18th on grid

articles.description: England's exciting style of rugby boosts their ambition of playing in front of a packed Twickenham at the 2025 World Cup.
articles.title: 'It won't be too long until England fill Twickenham'

articles.description: BBC Scotland's chief sports writer Tom English dissects a Scottish Cup rollercoaster at Hampden as Celtic edge past Aberdeen to set up a meeting with Rangers or Hearts.
articles.title: 'Aberdeen & Celtic deliver exhausting, exhilarating classic'

articles.description: It is only "half-time" of Chelsea's Women's Champions League semi-final tie with Barcelona but they may have just produced the greatest performance of manager Emma Hayes' tenure.
articles.title: 'Chelsea may have produced greatest performance of Hayes' tenure'

articles.description: Harry Kane scores his 33rd goal in the Bundesliga as Bayern Munich thrash Union Berlin 5-1 at the Stadion An der Alten Forsterei.
articles.title: Kane scores as Bayern Munich thump Union Berlin

articles.description: Kent fighter Sam Noakes is the new European lightweight champion after beating Yvan Mendy on points in London.
articles.title: Sam Noakes v Yvan Mendy: Kent fighter wins European lightweight title but loses perfect knockout record
